channel.title: dorian on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in dorian on Barefoot Rob

item.title: swuusi 1998 dorian
item.description: SWUUSI 11pm Tuesday 28 July 1998 transcribed from my diary During Sean's Hair and Foot Washing Workshop, I got my hair washed by Anna Magwood and Katy Robinson and my feet washed by Josh Voyles. The nurturing attention was wonderful. I was pretty well sunburned today with all my time spent at the lake, even though I started the day with SPF 50. Maybe it wasn't as waterproof as I hoped.
